instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Macbook A1502 820-3476 hdmi and thunderbolt external monitor not working
threads.message:
Hi, 

Got this machine water damaged. Had been repaired and seems all working ok except of external monitor. When i conect HDMI or Thunderbolt the macbook display start blinking constantly and external monitor says "no signal"

Is that logic board or sofware issue?

Thanks

threads.title: Macbook A1502 820-3476 hdmi and thunderbolt external monitor not working
threads.message: The HDMI port is on the I/O Board, so my guess is bad I/O board/I/O Cable on that one. Thunderbolt is a total waste of time, and I would completely forget about it.

threads.title: Macbook A1502 820-3476 hdmi and thunderbolt external monitor not working
threads.message: Already tried to change board. My guess is U9750 fucked.

threads.title: Macbook A1502 820-3476 hdmi and thunderbolt external monitor not working
threads.message: I was wright. Reballed u9750 and hdmi and thunderbolts now working.
